name: MKBoards Enhancer
description: Making MKBoards better by removing and fixing some stuff!

user.name: CodyMKW
user.about:
Hey my name is Cody I'm 27 and a huge fan of Nintendo I love all their games my favorite is the Animal Crossing series when I'm not playing games I love to watch anime umm so theres not really much else I can say about myself! ♥

If you find any problems with any of my styles feel free to let me know on the styles page and I will try to fix when I have the time!

5bf0f8a6

obsoletion_message: Not needed now that MKBoards has a few dark themes built into the site.
additional_info: Things to know: -Removing Username Colors will make users with a certain rank the default blue color but will add a star with the color of the rank they are beside their name. -Fix for box shadow makes the shadow around the user info box on posts a little smaller. -Fix for dark themes changes the border from the default blue color to a darker color to go with dark themes.
